text: Richard Joseph Hughes (August 10, 1909 â€“ December 7, 1992) was an American lawyer, politician, and judge. He served as the 45th governor of New Jersey from 1962-1970, and as Chief Justice of the New Jersey Supreme Court from 1973-1979. Hughes was the first Catholic governor in New Jersey's history. He was a Democrat. He died on December 7, 1992 in Boca Raton, Florida. title: Richard J. Hughes
